swab.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a small piece of material used to clean a wound or take a small amount of a substance from someone’s body in order to test it
swab.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a small amount of a substance that is taken from someone’s body with a swab in order to test it
swab.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The doctor took a throat swab to check for infection.
swab.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to clean something using a large amount of water
swab.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: a girl who was swabbing the tiled floor with a mop
swab.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to clean a wound with a small piece of special material
